title: some type help
content:
i just started a new job that has me handling a ton of type. i was was hired to mostly handle illustration and logos but some time i have to reproduce lines of type from preexisting images. i have not worked with type like that since school does any one have any pointers or tips? right now i scan the image with the type in and tinker with it but sometimes i have the worst time getting everything to line up just right.

thanks for the help.

 [‹ Font installation behavior in Creative Suite](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119054822/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42398 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help converting PMS 368U to CMYK ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119054822/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42244 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Thomas Kirk
